title: KEY MODELS & UNIQUE HERO TYPES
text:
' Those who first witness the undead are likely to be repulsed by their very existence. They are the antithesis of everything good and holy, a desecration of a corpse. Do not the gods promise us eternal life? Why should a corpse rot in the ground, when it can live anew as my assistant? This is my promise. In my service, you SHALL have eternal life. You shall never be forgotten.'

- Zaron, Human Necromancer.
